Name: Martinez (London spec. with genever)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bready notes from genever sit brilliantly with the herbal notes of the vermouth. Maraschino notes are subtle but essential to the balance of flavour.
History: This formula for the vintage classic emerged and became popular in London in early 2008 with the introduction of Antica Formula . See Martinez cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Martinez (London spec. with genever) contains 150 calories
